title: General
text: For purposes of section38, in the case of an eligible contractor, the new energy efficient home credit for the taxable year is the applicable amount for each qualified new energy efficient home which is——constructed by the eligible contractor, and—acquired by a person from such eligible contractor for use as a residence during the taxable year.

logical_structure.result: For purposes of section38, in the case of an eligible contractor, the new energy efficient home credit for the taxable year is the applicable amount for each qualified new energy efficient home which is——constructed by the eligible contractor, and—acquired by a person from such eligible contractor for use as a residence during the taxable year.

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 45L(a)(1)In General—For purposes of section38, in the case of an eligible contractor, the new energy efficient home credit for
                     the taxable year is the applicable amount for each qualified new energy efficient
                     home which is—I.R.C. § 45L(a)(1)(A)—constructed by the eligible contractor, andI.R.C. § 45L(a)(1)(B)—acquired by a person from such eligible contractor for use as a residence during the
                        taxable year.

title: Amount
text: For purposes of paragraph (1), the applicable amount is an amount equal to——in the case of a dwelling unit which is eligible to participate in the Energy Star Residential New Construction Program or the Energy Star Manufactured New Homes program——which meets the requirements of subsection(c)(1)(A)(and which does not meet the requirements of subsection(c)(1)(B)), $2,500, and—which meets the requirements of subsection(c)(1)(B), $5,000, and—in the case of a dwelling unit which is part of a building eligible to participate in the Energy Star Multifamily New Construction Program——which meets the requirements of subsection(c)(1)(A)(and which does not meet the requirements of subsection(c)(1)(B)), $500, and—which meets the requirements of subsection(c)(1)(B), $1,000.

logical_structure.result: For purposes of paragraph (1), the applicable amount is an amount equal to——in the case of a dwelling unit which is eligible to participate in the Energy Star Residential New Construction Program or the Energy Star Manufactured New Homes program——which meets the requirements of subsection(c)(1)(A)(and which does not meet the requirements of subsection(c)(1)(B)), $2,500, and—which meets the requirements of subsection(c)(1)(B), $5,000, and—in the case of a dwelling unit which is part of a building eligible to participate in the Energy Star Multifamily New Construction Program——which meets the requirements of subsection(c)(1)(A)(and which does not meet the requirements of subsection(c)(1)(B)), $500, and—which meets the requirements of subsection(c)(1)(B), $1,000.

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 45L(a)(2)Applicable Amount—For purposes of paragraph (1), the applicable amount is an amount equal to—I.R.C. § 45L(a)(2)(A)—in the case of a dwelling unit which is eligible to participate in the Energy Star
                        Residential New Construction Program or the Energy Star Manufactured New Homes program—I.R.C. § 45L(a)(2)(A)(i)—which meets the requirements of subsection(c)(1)(A)(and which does not meet the requirements of subsection(c)(1)(B)), $2,500, andI.R.C. § 45L(a)(2)(A)(ii)—which meets the requirements of subsection(c)(1)(B), $5,000, andI.R.C. § 45L(a)(2)(B)—in the case of a dwelling unit which is part of a building eligible to participate
                        in the Energy Star Multifamily New Construction Program—I.R.C. § 45L(a)(2)(B)(i)—which meets the requirements of subsection(c)(1)(A)(and which does not meet the requirements of subsection(c)(1)(B)), $500, andI.R.C. § 45L(a)(2)(B)(ii)—which meets the requirements of subsection(c)(1)(B), $1,000.

title: Contractor
text: The term “eligible contractor” means——the person who constructed the qualified new energy efficient home, or—in the case of a qualified new energy efficient home which is a manufactured home, the manufactured home producer of such home.

logical_structure.result: The term “eligible contractor” means——the person who constructed the qualified new energy efficient home, or—in the case of a qualified new energy efficient home which is a manufactured home, the manufactured home producer of such home.

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 45L(b)(1)Eligible Contractor—The term “eligible contractor” means—I.R.C. § 45L(b)(1)(A)—the person who constructed the qualified new energy efficient home, orI.R.C. § 45L(b)(1)(B)—in the case of a qualified new energy efficient home which is a manufactured home,
                        the manufactured home producer of such home.

title: New Energy Efficient Home
text: The term “qualified new energy efficient home” means a dwelling unit——located in the United States,—the construction of which is substantially completed after the date of the enactment of this section, and—which meets the energy saving requirements of subsection(c).

logical_structure.result: The term “qualified new energy efficient home” means a dwelling unit——located in the United States,—the construction of which is substantially completed after the date of the enactment of this section, and—which meets the energy saving requirements of subsection(c).

raw_text:

                        of this section, andI.R.C. § 45L(b)(2)(C)—which meets the energy saving requirements of subsection(c).

requirements: a dwelling unit——located in the United States,—the construction of which is substantially completed after the date of the enactment of this section, and—which meets the energy saving requirements of subsection(c).

logical_structure.result: The term “construction” includes substantial reconstruction and rehabilitation.

title: General
text: A dwelling unit meets the requirements of this subparagraph if such dwelling unit meets the requirements of paragraph (2) or (3) (whichever is applicable).
conditions: such dwelling unit meets the requirements of paragraph (2) or (3) (whichever is applicable).

if: such dwelling unit meets the requirements of paragraph (2) or (3) (whichever is applicable).
logical_structure.result: A dwelling unit meets the requirements of this subparagraph

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 45L(c)(1)(A)In General—A dwelling unit meets the requirements of this subparagraph if such dwelling unit
                        meets the requirements of paragraph (2) or (3) (whichever is applicable).

title: Energy Ready Home Program
text: A dwelling unit meets the requirements of this subparagraph if such dwelling unit is certified as a zero energy ready home under the zero energy ready home program of the Department of Energy as in effect on January 1, 2023 (or any successor program determined by the Secretary).
conditions: such dwelling unit is certified as a zero energy ready home under the zero energy ready home program of the Department of Energy as in effect on January 1, 2023 (or any successor program determined by the Secretary).

if: such dwelling unit is certified as a zero energy ready home under the zero energy ready home program of the Department of Energy as in effect on January 1, 2023 (or any successor program determined by the Secretary).
logical_structure.result: A dwelling unit meets the requirements of this subparagraph

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 45L(c)(1)(B)Zero Energy Ready Home Program—A dwelling unit meets the requirements of this subparagraph if such dwelling unit
                        is certified as a zero energy ready home under the zero energy ready home program
                        of the Department of Energy as in effect on January 1, 2023 (or any successor program
                        determined by the Secretary).

title: Home Requirements
text: A dwelling unit meets the requirements of this paragraph if——such dwelling unit meets—.R.C. § 45L(c)(2)(A)(i)(I)—in the case of a dwelling unit acquired before January 1, 2025, the Energy Star Single-Family New Homes National Program Requirements 3.1, or—in the case of a dwelling unit acquired after December 31, 2024, the Energy Star Single-Family New Homes National Program Requirements 3.2, and—the most recent Energy Star Single-Family New Homes Program Requirements applicable to the location of such dwelling unit (as in effect on the latter of January 1, 2023, or January 1 of two calendar years prior to the date the dwelling unit was acquired), or—such dwelling unit meets the most recent Energy Star Manufactured Home National program requirements as in effect on the latter of January 1, 2023, or January 1 of two calendar years prior to the date such dwelling unit is acquired.
conditions: ——such dwelling unit meets—.R.C. § 45L(c)(2)(A)(i)(I)—in the case of a dwelling unit acquired before January 1, 2025, the Energy Star Single-Family New Homes National Program Requirements 3.1, or—in the case of a dwelling unit acquired after December 31, 2024, the Energy Star Single-Family New Homes National Program Requirements 3.2, and—the most recent Energy Star Single-Family New Homes Program Requirements applicable to the location of such dwelling unit (as in effect on the latter of January 1, 2023, or January 1 of two calendar years prior to the date the dwelling unit was acquired), or—such dwelling unit meets the most recent Energy Star Manufactured Home National program requirements as in effect on the latter of January 1, 2023, or January 1 of two calendar years prior to the date such dwelling unit is acquired.

if: ——such dwelling unit meets—.R.C. § 45L(c)(2)(A)(i)(I)—in the case of a dwelling unit acquired before January 1, 2025, the Energy Star Single-Family New Homes National Program Requirements 3.1, or—in the case of a dwelling unit acquired after December 31, 2024, the Energy Star Single-Family New Homes National Program Requirements 3.2, and—the most recent Energy Star Single-Family New Homes Program Requirements applicable to the location of such dwelling unit (as in effect on the latter of January 1, 2023, or January 1 of two calendar years prior to the date the dwelling unit was acquired), or—such dwelling unit meets the most recent Energy Star Manufactured Home National program requirements as in effect on the latter of January 1, 2023, or January 1 of two calendar years prior to the date such dwelling unit is acquired.

title: Home Requirements
text: A dwelling unit meets the requirements of this paragraph if——such dwelling unit meets the most recent Energy Star Multifamily New Construction National Program Requirements (as in effect on either January 1, 2023, or January 1 of three calendar years prior to the date the dwelling was acquired, whichever is later), and—such dwelling unit meets the most recent Energy Star Multifamily New Construction Regional Program Requirements applicable to the location of such dwelling unit (as in effect on either January 1, 2023, or January 1 of three calendar years prior to the date the dwelling was acquired, whichever is later).
conditions: ——such dwelling unit meets the most recent Energy Star Multifamily New Construction National Program Requirements (as in effect on either January 1, 2023, or January 1 of three calendar years prior to the date the dwelling was acquired, whichever is later), and—such dwelling unit meets the most recent Energy Star Multifamily New Construction Regional Program Requirements applicable to the location of such dwelling unit (as in effect on either January 1, 2023, or January 1 of three calendar years prior to the date the dwelling was acquired, whichever is later).

if: ——such dwelling unit meets the most recent Energy Star Multifamily New Construction National Program Requirements (as in effect on either January 1, 2023, or January 1 of three calendar years prior to the date the dwelling was acquired, whichever is later), and—such dwelling unit meets the most recent Energy Star Multifamily New Construction Regional Program Requirements applicable to the location of such dwelling unit (as in effect on either January 1, 2023, or January 1 of three calendar years prior to the date the dwelling was acquired, whichever is later).
logical_structure.result: A dwelling unit meets the requirements of this paragraph

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 45L(c)(3)Multi-Family Home Requirements—A dwelling unit meets the requirements of this paragraph if—I.R.C. § 45L(c)(3)(A)—such dwelling unit meets the most recent Energy Star Multifamily New Construction
                        National Program Requirements (as in effect on either January 1, 2023, or January
                        1 of three calendar years prior to the date the dwelling was acquired, whichever is
                        later), andI.R.C. § 45L(c)(3)(B)—such dwelling unit meets the most recent Energy Star Multifamily New Construction
                        Regional Program Requirements applicable to the location of such dwelling unit (as
                        in effect on either January 1, 2023, or January 1 of three calendar years prior to
                        the date the dwelling was acquired, whichever is later).

title: Of Certification
text: A certification described in subsection(c)shall be made in accordance with guidance prescribed by the Secretary, after consultation with the Secretary of Energy. Such guidance shall specify procedures and methods for calculating energy and cost savings.

logical_structure.result: A certification described in subsection(c)shall be made in accordance with guidance prescribed by the Secretary, after consultation with the Secretary of Energy. Such guidance shall specify procedures and methods for calculating energy and cost savings.

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 45L(d)(1)Method Of Certification—A certification described in subsection(c)shall be made in accordance with guidance prescribed by the Secretary, after consultation
                     with the Secretary of Energy. Such guidance shall specify procedures and methods for
                     calculating energy and cost savings.

text: Any certification described in subsection(c)shall be made in writing in a manner which specifies in readily verifiable fashion the energy efficient building envelope components and energy efficient heating or cooling equipment installed and their respective rated energy efficiency performance.

logical_structure.result: Any certification described in subsection(c)shall be made in writing in a manner which specifies in readily verifiable fashion the energy efficient building envelope components and energy efficient heating or cooling equipment installed and their respective rated energy efficiency performance.

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 45L(d)(2)Form—Any certification described in subsection(c)shall be made in writing in a manner which specifies in readily verifiable fashion
                     the energy efficient building envelope components and energy efficient heating or
                     cooling equipment installed and their respective rated energy efficiency performance.

title: Adjustment
text: For purposes of this subtitle, if a credit is allowed under this section in connection with any expenditure for any property, the increase in the basis of such property which would (but for this subsection) result from such expenditure shall be reduced by the amount of the credit so determined. This subsection shall not apply for purposes of determining the adjusted basis of any building under section42.
conditions: a credit is allowed under this section in connection with any expenditure for any property, the increase in the basis of such property which would (but for this subsection) result from such expenditure shall be reduced by the amount of the credit so determined. This subsection shall not apply for purposes of determining the adjusted basis of any building under section42.

I.R.C. § 45L(e)Basis Adjustment—For purposes of this subtitle, if a credit is allowed under this section in connection

                  which would (but for this subsection) result from such expenditure shall be reduced
                  by the amount of the credit so determined. This subsection shall not apply for purposes
                  of determining the adjusted basis of any building under section42.

title: With Investment Credit
text: For purposes of this section, expenditures taken into account under section47or48(a)shall not be taken into account under this section.

title: General
text: The requirements described in this subparagraph with respect to any qualified residence are that the taxpayer shall ensure that any laborers and mechanics employed by the taxpayer or any contractor or subcontractor in the construction of such residence shall be paid wages at rates not less than the prevailing rates for construction, alteration, or repair of a similar character in the locality in which such residence is located as most recently determined by the Secretary of Labor, in accordance with subchapter IV of chapter 31 of title 40, United States Code.

logical_structure.result: The requirements described in this subparagraph with respect to any qualified residence are that the taxpayer shall ensure that any laborers and mechanics employed by the taxpayer or any contractor or subcontractor in the construction of such residence shall be paid wages at rates not less than the prevailing rates for construction, alteration, or repair of a similar character in the locality in which such residence is located as most recently determined by the Secretary of Labor, in accordance with subchapter IV of chapter 31 of title 40, United States Code.

                        is located as most recently determined by the Secretary of Labor, in accordance with

title: and Penalty Related To Failure To Satisfy Wage Requirements

title: And Guidance
text: The Secretary shall issue such regulations or other guidance as the Secretary determines necessary to carry out the purposes of this subsection, including regulations or other guidance which provides for requirements for recordkeeping or information reporting for purposes of administering the requirements of this subsection.

logical_structure.result: The Secretary shall issue such regulations or other guidance as the Secretary determines necessary to carry out the purposes of this subsection, including regulations or other guidance which provides for requirements for recordkeeping or information reporting for purposes of administering the requirements of this subsection.

                     necessary to carry out the purposes of this subsection, including regulations or other
                     guidance which provides for requirements for recordkeeping or information reporting
                     for purposes of administering the requirements of this subsection.

text: This section shall not apply to any qualified new energy efficient home acquired after June 30, 2026.

logical_structure.result: This section shall not apply to any qualified new energy efficient home acquired after June 30, 2026.

raw_text:
I.R.C. § 45L(h)Termination—This section shall not apply to any qualified new energy efficient home acquired after
                  June 30, 2026.
